alerts.title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
alerts.message: Severe thunderstorms with heavy rain and strong winds expected at JFK Airport between 15:00-19:00 EST. Flight delays and cancellations likely.
alerts.recommendations: Consider rerouting flights, prepare for ground delays

alerts.title: Aircraft Maintenance Required
alerts.message: Aircraft N123AA (Boeing 737-800) requires immediate inspection of hydraulic system before next scheduled flight AA1234.

alerts.title: Security Checkpoint Delay
alerts.message: Extended security screening procedures in effect at Terminal 2, Gate B area. Passengers advised to arrive 30 minutes earlier.
alerts.additionalInfo: Enhanced screening due to increased passenger volume

alerts.title: Air Traffic Control Delay
alerts.message: Ground stop implemented for all departures to Chicago O'Hare (ORD) due to runway construction. Average delay: 45 minutes.

alerts.title: Ground Vehicle Incident
alerts.message: Minor ground vehicle collision on Taxiway Alpha at LAX. No injuries reported. Taxiway temporarily closed for investigation.

alerts.title: Gate Change Notification
alerts.message: Flight AA1234 gate changed from A12 to A15 due to aircraft size requirements. Passengers notified via PA system.

alerts.title: Fuel Supply Shortage
alerts.message: Jet fuel supply running low at Denver International Airport. Priority refueling for long-haul flights. Possible delays for domestic flights.

alerts.title: Crew Scheduling Issue
alerts.message: Flight crew for DL5678 delayed due to incoming flight delay. Replacement crew being arranged. Estimated delay: 30 minutes.
